an4.99:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitaya patipanno hoti, no parahitaya?
an4.99:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attana panatipata pativirato hoti, no param panatipata veramaniya samadapeti;
an4.99:2.3: attana adinnadana pativirato hoti, no param adinnadana veramaniya samadapeti;
an4.99:2.4: attana kamesumicchacara pativirato hoti, no param kamesumicchacara veramaniya samadapeti;
an4.99:2.5: attana musavada pativirato hoti, no param musavada veramaniya samadapeti;
an4.99:2.6: attana suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato hoti, no param suramerayamajjapamadatthana veramaniya samadapeti.
an4.99:2.7: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitaya patipanno hoti, no parahitaya.
an4.99:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo parahitaya patipanno hoti, no attahitaya?
an4.99:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attana panatipata appativirato hoti, param panatipata veramaniya samadapeti;
an4.99:3.3: attana adinnadana appativirato hoti, param adinnadana veramaniya samadapeti;
an4.99:3.4: attana kamesumicchacara appativirato hoti, param kamesumicchacara veramaniya samadapeti;
an4.99:3.5: attana musavada appativirato hoti, param musavada veramaniya samadapeti;
an4.99:3.6: attana suramerayamajjapamadatthana appativirato hoti, param suramerayamajjapamadatthana veramaniya samadapeti.
an4.99:3.7: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo parahitaya patipanno hoti, no attahitaya.
an4.99:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo nevattahitaya patipanno hoti no parahitaya?
an4.99:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attana panatipata appativirato hoti, no param panatipata veramaniya samadapeti …pe… attana suramerayamajjapamadatthana appativirato hoti, no param suramerayamajjapamadatthana veramaniya samadapeti.
an4.99:4.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nevattahitaya patipanno hoti, no parahitaya.
an4.99:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitaya ceva patipanno hoti parahitaya ca?
an4.99:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attana ca panatipata pativirato hoti, paranca panatipata veramaniya samadapeti …pe… attana ca suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato hoti, paranca suramerayamajjapamadatthana veramaniya samadapeti.
an4.99:5.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitaya ceva patipanno hoti parahitaya ca.
an4.99:5.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
